sect2.title: How to unsubscribe?
sect2.para:
To unsubscribe from a list, send an email to
listar@linuxfromscratch.org and write unsubscribe listname as the subject header of the message.

You can, if you want, unsubscribe from multiple lists at the same time using one email. If you want to do so, write some junk as the subject header, something that isn't a valid command like "hello". Then write the unsubscribe commands in the body of the message. The email will look like:

blockquote.literallayout:
To: listar@linuxfromscratch.org Subject: hello
unsubscribe lfs-discuss unsubscribe lfs-apps unsubscribe alfs-discuss

sect2.para: After you have sent the email, the Listar program will send you an email back requesting a confirmation of your unsubscription request. After you have sent back this confirmation email, Listar will send you an email again with the message that you have been unsubscribed from the list(s).
